title: No Gaming Conventions Until 2021? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.15.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg have a discussion-heavy show tackling Fortnite's new delay, Cooking Mama's drama, and the possibility of no gaming cons until 2021. 
 
Time Stamps - 
 00:02:25 - Housekeeping
Streaming The Division 2 Raid today with Fran and friends! It’s all benefiting the American Cancer Society’s College Streaming Tournament -- help me help Mizzou at kindafunny.com/mizzou.
Gary Sent me a present
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:20 - Fortnite Chapter 2 - Season 2 Extended
00:16:40 - Cooking Mama Drama Gets Weirder, James Batchelor @GIB
00:20:40 - What motive does Planet Entertainment have to keep trying to put this game on shelves? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:24:25 - RIP EGM, Again. Kinda - Josh Harmon @ EGM
00:37:35 - Gamescom Officially on Ice for Live
00:48:16 -  Indie Megabooth sunset during Covid19
00:55:10 - Amazon France
00:57:25 - Pokemon Go Adding Remote Raid Passes
00:58:20 - Out today
01:05:12 - Squad Up:
01:07:00 - REQUIRED READING:18 Months After Red Dead Redemption 2, Rockstar Has Made Big Cultural Changes Jason @ Kotaku
https://kotaku.com/18-months-after-red-dead-redemption-2-rockstar-has-mad-1842880524
01:09:52 - You‘re Wrong
 01:09:49 - Post Show 
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
